xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.21 Hetuduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika » 1.21.2 Bahiddhārammaṇapada » 1.21.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetu
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika
Bahiddhārammaṇapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetu
535.
1200Nahetuṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
536.
1201Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā nava…pe…  napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1202Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1203Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1204(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
<< Hetuup1.21.2.7 Pañhāvāra >>
